text: A startup is migrating a monolithic e-commerce application to Google Cloud. The application has variable traffic with peaks during sales events. Leadership wants to reduce operational overhead while maintaining automatic scaling. Which GCP compute services provide automatic scaling and minimal operations? (Choose 2)
option_a: Managed instance groups with startup scripts
explanation: GKE (especially Autopilot) and App Engine Standard provide fully managed autoscaling with minimal ops. MIGs require OS management; Dataproc is for data processing.

text: A multinational company is migrating to Google Cloud. Each country has its own projects, but management wants integrated networking while maintaining project independence. How should you organize networking?
explanation: Shared VPC creates a single global VPC managed centrally (host project) while service projects maintain independence.

text: Your company plans to migrate a multi-petabyte dataset to the cloud. The data must be available 24/7 and analysts only know SQL. How should you store the data?
option_b: Insert data into Google Cloud SQL
option_c: Put flat files into Google Cloud Storage
option_d: Stream data into Google Cloud Datastore
explanation: BigQuery is a serverless, petabyte-scale data warehouse with standard SQL interface. Cloud SQL doesn't scale to petabytes.

text: You're using a single Cloud SQL instance and need to introduce high availability. What should you do?
option_a: Create a read replica in a different region
option_b: Create a failover replica in the same region but different zone
option_c: Enable automatic backups and binary logging
explanation: Cloud SQL HA uses synchronous replication to a failover replica in a different zone within the same region.

text: Your company has reserved a monthly budget. You want automatic notification when approaching the limit. What should you do?
option_a: Link a credit card with a monthly limit
option_b: Create budget alerts for 50%, 90%, and 100% of budget
option_c: Set a daily budget in App Engine Settings
explanation: Budget alerts proactively warn at configured thresholds via email or Pub/Sub.

text: You need to store objects that are accessed once a month for reporting. Availability is critical, but cost should be minimized. Which Storage class is best?
explanation: Nearline is optimized for data accessed less than once a month. Coldline is for once a quarter.

text: A mobile game needs near-continuous availability, low latency globally, and quick scaling. The backend exposes HTTP REST APIs. How should you design the backend?
option_a: Layer 4 TCP Load Balancer, MIGs in one zone
option_b: Layer 7 HTTPS Load Balancer, MIGs in one zone
option_c: Layer 7 HTTPS Load Balancer, MIGs in multiple regions
option_d: Layer 4 TCP Load Balancer, MIGs across multiple zones
explanation: Global HTTPS load balancer uses anycast to route users to nearest healthy backend. Multi-zone MIGs in multiple regions eliminate single points of failure.

text: Which three practices should you recommend for migrating a J2EE application? (Choose 3)
option_a: Port application code to App Engine
option_b: Integrate Cloud Dataflow for real-time metrics
option_e: Deploy CI/CD with automated testing in staging
explanation: Monitoring, Infrastructure as Code, and CI/CD are universal migration best practices.

text: A latency-sensitive service needs to scale from 8 to 160 instances quickly. What minimizes startup time?
option_a: Use Cloud OS Config to install packages after start
option_b: Build a custom image with all packages
option_d: Use Puppet to configure instances after creation
explanation: Prebaking packages into a custom image eliminates installation time at boot.

text: You need to change your GKE cluster's machine type from n1-standard-1 to n1-standard-4. What should you do?
option_a: Create a new node pool and migrate workloads
explanation: Machine types cannot be changed for existing node pools. You must create a new node pool.

text: Videos should move to Coldline after 90 days and delete after one year. How should you set up the policy?
option_a: Create a Cloud Function to move/delete
explanation: Declarative lifecycle rules handle time-based transitions natively.

text: A company behind a Global HTTPS Load Balancer needs defense against DDoS attacks. Which service should they implement?
explanation: Cloud Armor provides DDoS protection, WAF rules, and bot management at Google's network edge.

text: You are designing a stateless microservice that requires rapid scaling (up to 1000 instances) and processes asynchronous tasks from Pub/Sub. Which compute option is most cost-effective and efficient?
explanation: Cloud Run scales to zero and handles rapid burst scaling for stateless containers perfectly, often more cheaply than GKE for this use case.

text: MountKirk Games uses GKE and needs secure, standards-based access to GCP APIs without vendor lock-in. Which solution do you recommend?
explanation: Workload Identity is Google's recommended method for GKE pods to access GCP APIs securely.

text: You need to automatically build and deploy containerized applications when code is pushed to main. Which combination is recommended?
option_a: Source Repos, Cloud Build, Container Registry, Cloud Deploy
option_b: GitHub, Jenkins on GCE, Docker Hub, kubectl
option_c: Source Repos, Cloud Composer, Artifact Registry, Cloud Run
option_d: Bitbucket, Cloud Functions, Cloud Storage, App Engine
explanation: This is Google's recommended CI/CD stack. Cloud Deploy manages releases specifically.

text: Your SRE team needs 99.9% availability. Which correctly describes the relationship between SLI, SLO, and error budget?
option_a: SLI measures latency; SLO is contract
option_b: SLI is metric; SLO is target; Error budget is 100%-SLO
option_c: SLA is internal; SLO is customer-facing
explanation: SLI is the measured metric; SLO is the target; error budget is the acceptable failure rate (100% - SLO).

text: For HIPAA compliance on Google Cloud, which two actions are required? (Choose 2)
option_a: Verify services against HIPAA-compliant product list
option_d: Store all data in single region
explanation: Not all GCP services are HIPAA-compliant. A BAA is legally required for handling PHI.

text: You need to restrict a specific GCP project so it can only communicate with APIs in North America. You also need to prevent data exfiltration to external storage buckets. What should you use?
explanation: VPC Service Controls allow you to define a service perimeter to control data egress and restrict API access locations.

text: You are designing a hybrid cloud solution using Google Cloud. Your on-premises data center has strict latency requirements of less than 10ms for database queries. Which connectivity option should you recommend?
explanation: Dedicated Interconnect provides enterprise-grade connections with consistent low latency (<10ms) and up to 100 Gbps bandwidth directly to Google's network.

text: A financial services company needs to ensure that all data at rest is encrypted with customer-managed encryption keys (CMEK). Which service should they use to manage these keys?
explanation: Cloud KMS (Key Management Service) allows you to create, import, and manage cryptographic keys for CMEK across GCP services.

text: Your organization needs a relational database that can scale globally with strong consistency and automatic sharding. Which database service should you use?
explanation: Cloud Spanner is Google's globally distributed, horizontally scalable relational database with strong consistency and automatic sharding.

text: You need to deploy identical infrastructure across development, staging, and production environments. Which approach provides the best consistency and auditability?
option_b: Terraform with state stored in Cloud Storage
explanation: Terraform with remote state in Cloud Storage provides Infrastructure as Code with version control, consistency, and audit trails.

text: An application running on GKE needs to access Cloud SQL without using service account keys. What is the recommended approach?
option_a: Store service account key in Kubernetes Secret
option_b: Use Workload Identity to bind Kubernetes service accounts
option_c: Configure Cloud SQL public IP with SSL
option_d: Use Cloud SQL Auth Proxy with embedded credentials
explanation: Workload Identity allows GKE workloads to access GCP services without managing service account keys, improving security.

text: Your application experiences traffic spikes that can increase load by 10x within minutes. You need to ensure the application remains responsive. Which autoscaling strategy should you implement?
option_b: Reactive autoscaling based on CPU utilization
option_c: Predictive autoscaling with Cloud Monitoring forecasts
option_d: Fixed capacity with maximum expected load
explanation: Predictive autoscaling uses machine learning to forecast demand and scale proactively, handling sudden spikes better than reactive scaling.

text: You are migrating a legacy application that requires Windows Server with specific GPU requirements for video processing. Which compute option is most appropriate?
explanation: Compute Engine provides full control over VM configuration including Windows OS and NVIDIA GPU accelerators for video processing workloads.

text: Your team needs to implement blue-green deployments for a microservices application on GKE. Which combination of tools should you use?
option_a: kubectl apply with manual traffic shifting
option_b: Istio service mesh with traffic splitting
option_c: Cloud Build with manual rollback procedures
explanation: Istio provides fine-grained traffic management capabilities including weighted traffic splitting essential for blue-green and canary deployments.

text: A healthcare organization must implement data loss prevention (DLP) to detect and redact PHI in documents stored in Cloud Storage. Which approach is recommended?
option_a: Custom Cloud Functions scanning each upload
option_b: Cloud DLP API with info type detectors
option_c: Third-party scanning tools on Compute Engine
option_d: Manual review process with audit logging
explanation: Cloud DLP API provides pre-built info type detectors for PHI, PII, and other sensitive data with automated detection and redaction capabilities.

text: You need to design a data pipeline that ingests streaming data from IoT devices and performs real-time analytics. Which architecture is most appropriate?
option_c: IoT Core -> Cloud Functions -> Cloud SQL
explanation: Pub/Sub handles streaming ingestion, Dataflow provides real-time stream processing, and BigQuery enables analytics on the processed data.

text: You need to grant a contractor temporary access to specific Cloud Storage buckets for 30 days. What is the best approach?
option_a: Create a service account with permanent access
option_b: Use IAM Conditions with time-based expiration
option_c: Share bucket URLs publicly with limited time
option_d: Create temporary credentials in Secret Manager
explanation: IAM Conditions allow you to set time-based access controls that automatically expire, perfect for temporary contractor access.

text: Your multi-region application needs to failover to a secondary region within 5 minutes if the primary region fails. Which disaster recovery strategy should you implement?
option_a: Backup and restore from Cloud Storage
option_b: Pilot light with minimal standby resources
option_c: Warm standby with synchronized data replication
option_d: Multi-region active-active with global load balancing
explanation: Active-active multi-region with global load balancing provides near-instant failover by routing traffic away from unhealthy regions automatically.

text: You need to ensure that VM instances can only be created in approved regions to comply with data residency requirements. What should you configure?
explanation: Organization Policy constraints with location restrictions enforce data residency requirements at the organization or folder level.

text: Your application uses Cloud Memorystore for Redis as a session cache. You need to ensure high availability. What configuration should you use?
explanation: Memorystore Standard tier provides automatic failover with replica in another zone for high availability of session cache.

text: You are implementing a machine learning pipeline that trains models daily and deploys them to production. Which combination of services supports this workflow?
option_a: Cloud Functions -> Compute Engine -> Cloud Storage
option_b: Vertex AI Pipelines -> Vertex AI Training -> Vertex AI Endpoints
explanation: Vertex AI provides an integrated ML platform with Pipelines for orchestration, Training for model development, and Endpoints for serving.

text: Your organization requires that all API requests to GCP services are logged for compliance auditing. Which service should you enable?
explanation: Data Access Audit Logs record API calls that read or modify user data, essential for compliance auditing of GCP service access.

text: You need to run batch processing jobs that can tolerate interruptions to reduce costs. Which compute option should you use?
explanation: Preemptible/Spot VMs offer up to 91% discount and are ideal for fault-tolerant batch workloads that can handle interruptions.

text: Your application must maintain 99.99% availability. Which design principles should you prioritize? (Choose 2)
option_a: Single region deployment with automatic backups
option_e: Global load balancing with traffic management
explanation: 99.99% availability requires multi-region active-active deployment and automated self-healing to minimize downtime from any single failure.

text: You need to manage Kubernetes configurations across multiple clusters consistently. Which tool should you use?
explanation: Anthos Config Management provides GitOps-based configuration management to keep multiple clusters in sync with declarative configs.

text: A development team needs access to production logs for debugging but should not see sensitive customer data. What should you implement?
option_a: Separate log buckets with different IAM policies
option_b: Cloud Logging with log views and field-level access control
option_c: Export logs to BigQuery with column-level security
option_d: Redact all production logs before storage
explanation: Cloud Logging log views with field-level access control allow filtering sensitive data while maintaining access to non-sensitive log entries.

text: You are designing a content delivery system for a global streaming platform. Which combination provides the best user experience?
option_b: Cloud CDN with Cloud Storage origin
option_c: Media CDN with live streaming API
explanation: Media CDN is specifically optimized for video delivery with live streaming support, providing the best experience for streaming platforms.

text: Your CI/CD pipeline needs to run security scans and require approval before production deployment. Which Cloud Build features support this?
option_b: Cloud Build with Container Analysis and approval gates
explanation: Cloud Build integrates with Container Analysis for vulnerability scanning and supports approval gates for controlled production deployments.

text: You need to encrypt data before it reaches Google Cloud and maintain full control of the encryption keys. Which encryption approach should you use?
explanation: Client-side encryption encrypts data before upload, ensuring Google never has access to unencrypted data or encryption keys.

text: Your organization is adopting a multicloud strategy with workloads on AWS and GCP. Which service helps manage Kubernetes clusters across both clouds?
explanation: Anthos provides a consistent platform for managing Kubernetes workloads across GCP, on-premises, and other clouds like AWS and Azure.

text: You need to implement chaos engineering practices to test your application's resilience. Which approach is recommended on GCP?
option_d: Disable regions in load balancer configuration
explanation: Istio service mesh provides native fault injection capabilities for testing application resilience without affecting production infrastructure.

text: You need to automate the rotation of service account keys every 90 days. What is the recommended approach?
option_c: Use Workload Identity instead of keys
explanation: The best practice is to eliminate service account keys entirely by using Workload Identity, which provides automatic credential management.

text: Your application processes credit card payments and must be PCI-DSS compliant. Which controls are essential? (Choose 2)
option_a: Store cardholder data in Cloud SQL with default encryption
option_b: Segment networks using VPC and firewall rules
option_c: Use Cloud DLP to detect and tokenize card numbers
option_d: Enable public access for payment APIs
option_e: Implement network monitoring with Packet Mirroring
explanation: PCI-DSS requires network segmentation to isolate cardholder data and tokenization to minimize exposure of actual card numbers.

text: You are designing a system that needs to process 10 million events per second with sub-millisecond latency. Which messaging service should you use?
explanation: Apache Kafka on GKE provides the highest throughput with sub-millisecond latency for extreme event processing requirements.

text: Your team needs to implement feature flags for controlled rollouts. Which approach integrates best with GCP?
explanation: Firebase Remote Config provides a managed feature flag service that integrates with GCP and supports gradual rollouts and A/B testing.

text: You need to set up alerting for when your application's error rate exceeds 1% over a 5-minute window. Which Cloud Monitoring feature should you use?
explanation: Alerting policies with custom metrics allow you to define specific thresholds (like 1% error rate) and time windows for notifications.

text: Your organization needs to implement a zero-trust security model for accessing internal applications. Which service provides this capability?
explanation: Cloud IAP implements zero-trust access by verifying user identity and context before granting access to applications.

text: You need to run a stateful application with persistent storage on GKE. Which storage option provides the best performance for database workloads?
explanation: SSD Persistent Disks (pd-ssd) provide the lowest latency and highest IOPS for database workloads on GKE.

text: You need to restrict which container images can be deployed to your GKE clusters. What should you implement?
explanation: Binary Authorization enforces deploy-time security by requiring attestations that verify container images meet your organization's standards.

text: Your global application needs to route users to the nearest healthy backend with automatic failover. Which load balancer configuration is required?
explanation: Global external HTTP(S) load balancer uses anycast IPs to route users to the nearest healthy backend with automatic cross-region failover.

text: You need to scan your Terraform code for security misconfigurations before deployment. Which tool integrates with Cloud Build for this purpose?
option_c: Checkov or tfsec with Cloud Build
explanation: Checkov and tfsec are Infrastructure-as-Code security scanners that integrate with Cloud Build pipelines for pre-deployment security checks.

text: Your data science team needs a collaborative environment for developing and sharing Jupyter notebooks with access to GCP services. Which solution should you provide?
explanation: Vertex AI Workbench provides managed Jupyter notebook instances with built-in authentication and access to all GCP services.

text: You are implementing GitOps for your GKE deployments. Which workflow best supports this pattern?
option_a: Push-based with Cloud Build deploying directly
option_b: Pull-based with Config Sync monitoring a Git repo
option_c: Manual kubectl apply from developer machines
option_d: Scheduled Cloud Scheduler jobs for deployments
explanation: GitOps uses pull-based deployment where Config Sync continuously monitors a Git repository and syncs cluster state to match.

text: Your organization needs to detect and respond to security threats across GCP resources. Which service provides centralized security management?
explanation: Security Command Center provides centralized visibility into security threats, vulnerabilities, and misconfigurations across GCP resources.

text: You need to implement distributed tracing for microservices deployed across multiple GCP services. Which tool should you use?
explanation: Cloud Trace provides distributed tracing to track requests across microservices and identify latency bottlenecks.

text: You are designing a data lake architecture that supports both batch and streaming analytics with governance controls. Which combination is recommended?
explanation: Dataplex provides unified data governance for data lakes, with Dataflow for streaming, Cloud Storage for raw data, and BigQuery for analytics.
